name: unmade man
description:
a brief conversation at the end of the world with notorious smuggler, donovan hart.

 running into familiar faces in the zombie apocalypse isn't always a given- so he makes it a point to make time for a quick chat en route to searching a compound pharmacy for supplies. he went to school for chemistry, y'know! 

made for the o2a2 2022 visual novel jam. baby's first project in ren'py! O2A2 2022 Art by Agui-Chart - https://twitter.com/Agui_chART/ O2A2 2022 Logo by MysteryCorgi - https://www.artstation.com/mysterycorgi/
